# PlayerSpawnAfterEventSignal Class

## Extends
- [*IPlayerSpawnAfterEventSignal*](IPlayerSpawnAfterEventSignal.md)

Registers an event when a player is spawned (or re-spawned after death) and fully ready within the world.
